summary: Fixed security issue: Added .autopilot.json to .gitignore and removed it from git tracking. The file contains sensitive credentials (telegram token, email passwords, feishu appSecret) and should never be committed to version control.
current_status: Security vulnerability fixed. .autopilot.json is now properly ignored by git. File removed from tracking but still exists locally. Developers should populate credentials in their local copy without risk of committing them.
